job.title: C++ Developer
job.description: <p><strong>Required Skills</strong></p><p>3-5 years of C++ development experience.</p><p>Grid computing technologies.</p><p>Technical background in integration, development, and/or infrastructure.</p><p>Familiar with system architecture to understand how data flows from upstream systems to downstream integration.</p><p>Excellent relationship management, communication, teamwork, and influence skills; ability to operate at senior levels in both written and verbal communications interacting professionally with a diverse group, executives, managers, and subject matter experts.</p><p>Excellent communication, organization, facilitation and analytical skills, attention to details and ability to multi-task.</p><p>Exposure to overall SDLC process, technology frameworks and tools (ex: Jira, HP Quality Center, etc.).&nbsp;Highly versed in various development methodologies, including waterfall and agile software development lifecycle.</p><p>Self-motivated and can work independently as well as in a team environment.</p><p>Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment is crucial.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Skills Desired</strong></p><p>Previous experience in the financial services field, with emphasis on Market Risk area.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Educational Qualification</strong></p><p>Minimum BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>&nbsp;</li></ul>
